contentrichtext.text: {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Beaumais}} {{Infobox French commune |name = Beaumais |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Caen |canton = Morteaux-CoulibÅ“uf |INSEE = 14053 |postal code = 14620 |mayor = Colette Hunou |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Pays de Falaise |longitude = -0.0739 |latitude = 48.8958 |elevation m = 60 |elevation min m = 47 |elevation max m = 83 |area km2 = 10.73 |population = 182 |population date = 2008 }} '''Beaumais''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left |1962|218 |1968|217 |1975|205 |1982|169 |1990|157 |1999|164 |2008|182 }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{Calvados communes}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
